mapper.select: select a.*,b.START_TIME,b.END_TIME from ( select count(*) count,SURVER_QUESTION_ID from ( select CREATE_USER_ID,SURVER_QUESTION_ID from SURVEY_QUESTION_ANSWER agswer left join SURVEY_QUESTION_EXTEND_INFO_ANSWER eanswer on agswer.CREATE_USER_ID = eanswer.CURRENT_USER_ID left join SURVEY_QUESTION_EXTEND_INFO extend on eanswer.EXTEND_INFO_ID = extend.id group by SURVER_QUESTION_ID,CREATE_USER_ID ) group by SURVER_QUESTION_ID ) a left join SURVEY_QUESTION b on a.SURVER_QUESTION_ID = b.id
